vcmove.no_members: $[emoji.warning] No members found in the voice channel.
vcmove.failure: $[emoji.error] Failed to move members to the voice channel.
vcmove.success: $[emoji.success] Successfully moved members to the voice channel.
vcmove.partial: $[emoji.warning] Successfully moved **${MOVED}/${TOTAL}** members to the voice channel.

confirmation.question_countdown:
$[emoji.warning] Are you **absolutely** sure you want to remove all ${COUNT} channels in category ${CATEGORY}?
**THIS ACTION IS IRREVERSIBLE!**

The button will unlock ${BUTTON_UNLOCK_TIMESTAMP}.
confirmation.question:
$[emoji.warning] Are you **absolutely** sure you want to remove all ${COUNT} channels in category ${CATEGORY}?
**THIS ACTION IS IRREVERSIBLE!**

Click the button below to confirm or delete this message.

timestamp.result: $[emoji.success] You can copy the timestamps for ${TIMESTAMP} below.
timestamp.timezone_unknown: $[emoji.warning] Timezone is not certain. Try specifying it with your query. Assumed offset: ${OFFSET}.

deepl.invalid_key: $[emoji.error] Invalid DeepL API key. Authentication failed.
deepl.usage:
The current usage of the API for the configured API key is:
```
${USAGE}
```
deepl.no_key: $[emoji.error] No DeepL API key currently set. Server managers can set one with `/deepl-config <key>`. To get an API key, sign up on <https://www.deepl.com/pro-api>!
deepl.key_set: $[emoji.success] DeepL API key set and verified successfully.

vcnotifications.no_permission: $[emoji.error] You don't have permission to use this command.

retroactive.started: $[emoji.process] Started adding auto-reactions to existing messages‚Ä¶
retroactive.finished: $[emoji.success] Finished adding auto-reactions to existing messages.

retroactive-remove.started: $[emoji.process] Started removing auto-reactions from existing messages‚Ä¶
retroactive-remove.finished: $[emoji.success] Finished removing auto-reactions from existing messages.

vcmove.name: vcmove
vcmove.description: Moves members to the voice channel.

from.name: from
from.description: The voice channel to move members from.

to.name: to
to.description: The voice channel to move members to.

remove-category.name: remove-category
remove-category.description: Removes every single channel in a category.

timestamp.name: timestamp
timestamp.description: Returns discord timestamps to copy and paste.

deepl.name: deepl
deepl.description: Translates text using the DeepL API.

source.name: source
source.description: The source language. By default, automatic detection is used.

deepl-config.name: deepl-config
deepl-config.description: Sets the DeepL API key or checks the limits.

vcnotifications.name: vcnotifications
vcnotifications.description: Enables or disables voice channel notifications.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The voice channel to configure notifications for.

enable.name: enable
enable.description: Whether to enable or disable voice channel notifications.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to add the auto-reaction to.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to remove the auto-reaction from.

reactions.name: reactions
reactions.description: The reactions to remove the auto-reactions of. If not specified, all auto-reactions are removed.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to add reactions to.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to remove reactions from.

reactions.name: reactions
reactions.description: The reactions to remove the reactions of. If not specified, all reactions are removed.

remove-all-users.name: remove-all-users
remove-all-users.description: Whether to remove all users' reactions or only the bot's.
